pros: Inspirational mission - doing good work for real people. You get to see the impact directly when you hear from real wish families and see the difference a wish has on a child.
cons: Organization merged with Children's Wish Foundation a few years ago and it has been a mess since. Major staff exodus and management challenges. Do not recommend until they get things organized.

review_title: Difficult work environment and toxic culture
pros: Some really incredible people work here! There's great comraderie among lower-mid level staff. Truly love my coworkers.
cons: Senior leadership is ineffective and does not care about employee well being or mental health. The mission is secondary to cost saving and the children and families we serve are being affected.
